name: Random Puzzles
description:
Complete a picture out of a random image from internet or random picture related to keyword. You can also import your images (png, gif, jpg, tga). 

Game has variety of levels of difficulty from 2x2 to 20x1 to 30x30. 

All pictures are also automatically downloaded so you can browse your collection or import one of them.

You can change the default background by swapping "background.png" in data folder with other png image.
